content: to commence the round stndst in stndst from previous round 2 chain 2 then double_crochet 11 times into circle if using magic_ring now pull taut 2 double_crochet in the next two dcs 3 slip_stitch into first double_crochet skip 2 chain to close circle 3 double_crochet in each of next two chain stitches stitch count 11 double_crochet excluding beginning 2 chain 4 chain 1 and skip all of chain slip_stitch and chain round 2 double the stitch count 5 double_crochet in each of next two chain stitches 1 to commence the round stndst7 in first double_crochet from previous round 6 double_crochet in each of the next three double_crochet stitches 2 double_crochet in the same stitch that the stndst was made 7 double_crochet in each of next two chain stitches 3 2 double_crochet in each of the remaining stitches around 8 chain 1 and skip all of chain slip_stitch and chain 4 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 9 double_crochet in each of next two chain stitches stitch count 22 double_crochet 2 dcs made in each stitch from round 1 10 repeat steps 6 to 9 five times 11 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 round 3 increase in every second stitch stitch count 49 double_crochet and 7 chain 1 space 1 to commence the round stndst in stndst from previous round 2 2 double_crochet in the next stitch round 12 half_double_crochet in all stitches around 3 double_crochet in the next stitch 1 to commence the round hdcstndst in stndst from previous round 4 2 double_crochet in the next stitch 2 half_double_crochet in each of the next 4 dcs 5 repeat steps 3 and 4 nine times 3 half_double_crochet over chain space 6 slip_stitch into the stndst from step 1 4 half_double_crochet in each of next 7 dcs stitch count 33 double_crochet 5 half_double_crochet over chain space 6 repeat steps 4 and 5 five times 7 half_double_crochet in each of the last 2 dcs 8 slip_stitch into the hdcstndst from step 1 stitch count 56 half_double_crochet 6 refer to the crochet fix spin stitch youtube video for those of you who find crab stitch slip_stitch finishing round optional difficult to work this is an alternative option that results in the same finish 7 or substitute with 3 chain for stndst and 2 chain for hdcstndst if you prefer then use this option slip_stitch in every stitch around careful to maintain same gauge as previous half_double_crochet round consistently throughout page | 7 round 4 increase in every third stitch round 8 first round diamond flower 1 to commence the round stndst in stndst from previous round 1 to commence the round stndst in hdcstndst from previous round 2 double_crochet in the next stitch 2 double_crochet in each of the next three stitches 3 2 double_crochet in the next stitch 3 chain 3 and skip the next stitch 4 double_crochet in each of the next two stitches 4 double_crochet in each of the next seven stitches 5 2 double_crochet in the next
